result.eng: They violated the Official Languages Act.
result.ga: Sháraigh siad Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla
result.orig: Sháraigh siad Acht na dTeangacha Oifigiúla
result.html: Sháraigh siad Acht na dTeangacha OifigiúlaThey violated the Official Languages Act.
result.ponchtml: Ṡáraiġ siad Aċt na dTeangaċa OifigiúlaThey violated the Official Languages Act.

result.eng: The language they spoke was Irish and not English.
result.ga: Ba í Gaeilge seachas Béarla an teanga a labhair siad
result.orig: Ba í Gaeilge seachas Béarla an teanga a labhair siad
result.html: Ba í Gaeilge seachas Béarla an teanga a labhair siadThe language they spoke was Irish and not English.
result.ponchtml: Ba í Gaeilge seaċas Béarla an teanga a laḃair siadThe language they spoke was Irish and not English.

result.eng: They were using Irish as a secret language.
result.ga: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúnda
result.orig: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúnda
result.html: Bhí an Ghaeilge á húsáid acu mar theanga rúndaThey were using Irish as a secret language.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an Ġaeilge á húsáid acu mar ṫeanga rúndaThey were using Irish as a secret language.

result.eng: He was very interested in languages.
result.ga: Bhí suim mhór aige i dteangacha
result.orig: Bhí suim mhór aige i dteangacha
result.html: Bhí suim mhór aige i dteangachaHe was very interested in languages.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí suim ṁór aige i dteangaċaHe was very interested in languages.

result.eng: They are fluent in both languages.
result.ga: Tá siad líofa sa dá theanga
result.orig: Tá siad líofa sa dá theanga
result.html: Tá siad líofa sa dá theangaThey are fluent in both languages.
result.ponchtml: Tá siad líofa sa dá ṫeangaThey are fluent in both languages.

result.eng: They teach languages in this school.
result.html: Múintear teangacha sa scoil seoThey teach languages in this school.
result.ponchtml: Múintear teangaċa sa scoil seoThey teach languages in this school.

result.eng: A large number of languages are being used in Ireland today.
result.ga: Tá líon mór teangacha in úsáid in Éirinn sa lá atá inniu ann
result.orig: Tá líon mór teangacha in úsáid in Éirinn sa lá atá inniu ann
result.html: Tá líon mór teangacha in úsáid in Éirinn sa lá atá inniu annA large number of languages are being used in Ireland today.
result.ponchtml: Tá líon mór teangaċa in úsáid in Éirinn sa lá atá inniu annA large number of languages are being used in Ireland today.

result.eng: A country without language is a country without soul.
result.ga: Tír gan teanga tír gan anam
result.orig: Tír gan teanga tír gan anam
result.html: Tír gan teanga tír gan anamA country without language is a country without soul.
result.ponchtml: Tír gan teanga tír gan anamA country without language is a country without soul.

result.eng: How many languages can you speak?
result.html: Cé mhéad teanga atá agatHow many languages can you speak?
result.ponchtml: Cé ṁéad teanga atá agatHow many languages can you speak?
